corrupted_lord.name: Corrupted Lord
corrupted_lord.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war.

corrupted_lord_mount.name: Corrupted Lord on Cursed Steed
corrupted_lord_mount.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war ontop of a demonic beast.

corrupted_lord_on_lizard.name: Corrupted Lord on Lizard Beast
corrupted_lord_on_lizard.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war ontop of a massive lizard beast.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: A corrupted spellcaster, bending reality to the twisted visions of their dark gods.

sorcerer_horse.name: Sorcerer on Cursed Steed
sorcerer_horse.description: A corrupted spellcaster on a demonic beast, bending reality to the twisted visions of their dark gods.

exalted_sorcerer_disk.name: Exalted Sorcerer on Arcane Disk
exalted_sorcerer_disk.description: A spellcaster on top of a floating disk, who has mastered the reality-shifting magic of the old gods.

corrupted_warrior.name: Corrupted Warrior
corrupted_warrior.description: A corrupted warrior who marches into battle to gain the favours of their dark gods.

corrupted_warrior_leader.name: Corrupted Warrior Leader
corrupted_warrior_leader.description: A corrupted warrior leaderwho marches into battle to gain the favours of their dark gods.

corrupted_mutant.name: Corrupted Mutant
corrupted_mutant.description: A corrupted warrior who has gone insane in their twisted body.

corrupted_mutant_leader.name: Corrupted Mutant Leader
corrupted_mutant_leader.description: A corrupted warrior leader who has gone insane in their twisted body.

corrupted_barbarian.name: Corrupted Barbarian
corrupted_barbarian.description: A frenzied Warrior who rushes into battle to appease their dark gods.

corrupted_barbarian_leader.name: Corrupted Barbarian Leader
corrupted_barbarian_leader.description: A frenzied Warrior leader who rushes into battle to appease their dark gods.

barbarian_outrider.name: Barbarian Outrider
barbarian_outrider.description: A barbarian who rides atop crazed beast into battle, trampling their foes under their hooves and steel.

barbarian_outrider_leader.name: Barbarian Outrider Leader
barbarian_outrider_leader.description: A barbarian leader who rides atop crazed beast into battle, trampling their foes under their hooves and steel.

corrupted_knight.name: Corrupted Knight
corrupted_knight.description: A corrupted knight who rides into battle atop a demonic steed to gain the favours of their dark gods.

corrupted_knight_leader.name: Corrupted Knight Leader
corrupted_knight_leader.description: A corrupted knight leader who rides into battle atop a demonic steed to gain the favours of their dark gods.

chosen.name: Corrupted Chosen
chosen.description: Blessed by their dark gods, this warrior sets out to slay the mightiest of heroes.

chosen_leader.name: Corrupted Chosen Leader
chosen_leader.description: Blessed by their dark gods, this warrior leader sets out to slay the mightiest of heroes.

chosen_knight.name: Chosen Knight
chosen_knight.description: Personal Bodyguard of the great Corrupted Lords, ready to bring carnage to the battlefield.

chosen_knight_leader.name: Chosen Knight Leader
chosen_knight_leader.description: Personal Bodyguard leader of the great Corrupted Lords, ready to bring carnage to the battlefield.

pestilence_warrior.name: Pestilence Warrior
pestilence_warrior.description: A corrupted warrior who has been blessed by the god of pestilence.

pestilence_warrior_leader.name: Pestilence Warrior Leader
pestilence_warrior_leader.description: A corrupted warrior leader who has been blessed by the god of pestilence.

excess_warrior.name: Excess Warrior
excess_warrior.description: A sadistic warrior who marches into battle in gleaming armour.

excess_warrior_leader.name: Excess Warrior Leader
excess_warrior_leader.description: A sadistic warrior leader who marches into battle in gleaming armour.

excess_outrider.name: Excess Outrider
excess_outrider.description: This cultist of excess rides a demonic mount that has been blessed with unnatural swiftness.

excess_outrider_leader.name: Excess Outrider Leader
excess_outrider_leader.description: This cultist leader of excess rides a demonic mount that has been blessed with unnatural swiftness.

corrupted_berzerker.name: Corrupted Berzerker
corrupted_berzerker.description: A mindless brute blessed with eternal bloodlust, killing for their god of wrath.

corrupted_berzerker_leader.name: Corrupted Berzerker Leader
corrupted_berzerker_leader.description: A mindless brute leader blessed with eternal bloodlust, killing for their god of wrath.

enchanted_knight.name: Enchanted Knight
enchanted_knight.description: A knight who has acquired forbidden knowledge and transmutated their steed into an arcane disk.

enchanted_knight_leader.name: Enchanted Knight Leader
enchanted_knight_leader.description: A knight leader who has acquired forbidden knowledge and transmutated their steed into an arcane disk.

manticore.name: Manticore
manticore.description: A terrifying winged beast, raging across the battlefield in a flurry of claws and teeth.

demonic_spawn.name: Demonic Spawn
demonic_spawn.description: Horribly mutated beings that run rampant on the battlefield.

corrupted_tactics.name: Corrupted Tactics
corrupted_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

artifact.name: Cursed Artifact
artifact.description: Once per turn, for every model with this rule, add +1 to a cast roll of a friendly Power model within 6“ of this unit.

companion.name: Arcane Companion
companion.description: Once per turn when a power within 24“ of this model gets dispelled, deal 1 hit with AP(2) to the caster.

disk_of_magic.name: Disk of Magic
disk_of_magic.description: This model increases its Movement by 2". This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description:
At the beginning of the game choose one of the following effects to be applied to this unit:
* Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP
* Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
* +1 Save

strategies.name: Eye of the Gods
strategies.description: Use when a friendly unit destroys an enemy unit. That unit gains +1 Strength until the end of the battle. A unit may only be affected by this strategy once.
strategies.flavor: The forces of chaos commit countless bloodbaths to appease their dark gods, in hope of gaining boons and turning into a demon lord.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Unflinged by the horrors of war, the forces of chaos march ever forward.

strategies.name: Blazing Runes
strategies.description: Use before an Infantry unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
strategies.flavor: Corrupted Warriors wield enchanted weapons, covered in unholy runes and burning with dark magic.

strategies.name: Arcane Focus
strategies.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a Power. The powers charge value is increased by 1 and it has +6" range.
strategies.flavor: Through the usage of arcane rituals the potenty of powers can be enhanced as if they're guided by fate.

strategies.name: Time Trap
strategies.description: Use when one of your units is targeted by an attack. Roll a die for each hit, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
strategies.flavor: Time slows down to a crawl, rendering lethal strikes useless.

strategies.name: Hand of Fate
strategies.description: Use when taking a set of skill tests. Re-roll all failed skill tests.
strategies.flavor: Forcing fate itself to surrender to their will, these warriors are able to surpass any challenge.

strategies.name: Ferocity
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit charges. All models in that unit may make one additional attack.
strategies.flavor: Blinded by rage, these warriors will halt at nothing to rip their foes to pieces.

strategies.name: Counter Attack
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Counter Attack reaction without testing Initiative.
strategies.flavor: These warriors are prepared to slaughter anyone foolish enough to charge their ranks.

strategies.name: Nullify
strategies.description: Use when a Power(x) test is taken within 24" of an _Infantry_ unit. Roll a D10. If the result is equal to or less than the casting result, the power is stopped.
strategies.flavor: These warriors are trained in disrupting the enemies minds and stopping their powers from manifesting.

strategies.name: Burst of Speed
strategies.description: Use when a unit makes a Move or declares a Charge action. That unit gets +3" of Movement for that action.
strategies.flavor: Empowered by their desire to inflict pain upon their foes, these warriors move swiftly across the battlefield.

strategies.name: Heroic Challenge
strategies.description: Use when a _Leader_ unit fights. That unit gains +1 Strength for that attack or +2 Strength when attacking a unit with the _Leader_ or _Support_ special rule.
strategies.flavor: This warrior seeks out great foes to slay on the battlefield, inspiring their allies to inflict greater pain.

strategies.name: Poisoned Blades
strategies.description: Use when fighting with an _Infantry_ unit. If the attack hits, assign 2 additional Shock.
strategies.flavor: These warriors coat their weapons in lethal cocktails of poisons, toxins and drugs, increasing the pain their prey suffers by tenfold.

strategies.name: Resilience
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
strategies.flavor: These warriors are so diseased and rotten that they can shrug off lethal attacks with ease.

strategies.name: Pestilent Aura
strategies.description: Use when you activate an _Infantry_ unit. Up to 2 units within 6" take 3 hits with AP(1) each.
strategies.flavor: Surrounded by a miasma of death and decay, these warriors have truly been blessed by their god of pestilence.

strategies.name: Spiteful Curse
strategies.description: Use when a friendly _Infantry_ unit is killed by an attack. Roll a D10. On a 3 or less deal 3 hits with AP(2) to the unit that attacked it.
strategies.flavor: The followers of pestilence are bloated and cursed with deadly diseases, which bursts out in a wave of unholy energy when they are killed.

relics.name: Unholy Strength
relics.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Unholy Strength.
relics.flavor: Those that pray to the dark gods reveive blessings beyond human comprehension.

relics.name: War Veteran
relics.flavor: This hero has lived through so many battles that nothing can phase it anymore.

relics.name: Blade of Ruin
relics.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Great Weapon with the Blade of Ruin.
relics.flavor: This ancient relic emits an aura of malice, dripping with black blood.

balefire.name: Balefire
balefire.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 3 hits with AP(1).

sap_strength.name: Sap Strength
sap_strength.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Strength until the end of the turn.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcane_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

arcane_barrage.name: Arcane Barrage
arcane_barrage.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 5 hits with AP(1). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 3 hits with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

unholy_regenaration.name: Unholy Regeneration
unholy_regenaration.description: Target friendly unit within 12" heals 1 lost wound.

deadly_miasma.name: Deadly Miasma
deadly_miasma.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Save until the end of the turn.

spreading_plague.name: Spreading Plague
spreading_plague.description: Roll a d10 for every enemy unit within 12". On a 3 or less that unit takes 4 hits with AP(1).

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.description: Target friendly unit within 12" has +1 Strength until the end of the turn.

boiling_blood.name: Boiling Blood
boiling_blood.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes a 3 hits with AP(2).

warpath.name: Warpath
warpath.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free charge action.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.description:
Target friendly unit within 18" gains one of the following effects until the end of the phase: 
 * The unit may make a free Shoot action after it moves 
 * The unit may make a free Charge action after it moves

infernal_hypnosis.name: Infernal Hypnosis
infernal_hypnosis.description: Target enemy unit within 24" suffers -1 Accuracy, -1 Strength, and -1 Courage until the end of the activation phase.

sirens_song.name: Sirens Song
sirens_song.description: Target friendly unit within 24" may immediately activate, and use this model's Courage value until the end of the activation phase.
